com.kuryshee.safehome.appcommunicationconsts - package com.kuryshee.safehome.appcommunicationconsts
Package contains classes needed for communication with Android application Safe Home.
com.kuryshee.safehome.database - package com.kuryshee.safehome.database
Contains definition of interface for accessing the database DatabaseAccessInterface.
com.kuryshee.safehome.httprequestsender - package com.kuryshee.safehome.httprequestsender
Package contains helper classes for communication via HTTP requests, which are used throughout Safe Home.
com.kuryshee.safehome.requestdataretriever - package com.kuryshee.safehome.requestdataretriever
Contains helper classes for retrieving data from GET and POST HTTP requests in the format, used throughout Safe Home.
com.kuryshee.safehome.requestprocessorinterface - package com.kuryshee.safehome.requestprocessorinterface
Contains definition of interface for processing HTTP GET requests, common throughout Safe Home.
com.kuryshee.safehome.rpi - package com.kuryshee.safehome.rpi
Package contains classes which operate with the hardware part of Safe Home on Raspberry Pi.
com.kuryshee.safehome.rpicommunicationconsts - package com.kuryshee.safehome.rpicommunicationconsts
Package contains classes needed for communication with Raspberry Pi application Safe Home.
com.kuryshee.safehome.rpiserver - package com.kuryshee.safehome.rpiserver
Implementation of local server on Raspberry Pi.
com.kuryshee.safehome.sanitizer - package com.kuryshee.safehome.sanitizer
Package contains sanitizing class for processing input from user on HTML pages.
com.kuryshee.safehome.server - package com.kuryshee.safehome.server
Provides classes necessary for server implementation in Safe Home project.
COMMAND_READTOKEN - Static variable in class com.kuryshee.safehome.rpicommunicationconsts.RpiCommunicationConsts
Constant for the server to tell the Raspberry Pi to read a RFID token.
COMMAND_UPDATEUSERS - Static variable in class com.kuryshee.safehome.rpicommunicationconsts.RpiCommunicationConsts
Constant for the server to tell the Raspberry Pi to update user list.
compare(UserBean, UserBean) - Method in class com.kuryshee.safehome.rpi.UserComparator
Compares of instances of UserBean.

The real path to the configuration file
CONFIG_KEYSFILE - Static variable in class com.kuryshee.safehome.rpi.Main
The path to the configuration file with information about registered users.
connect() - Method in class com.kuryshee.safehome.httprequestsender.FormUploader
Finishes settings of the connection and gets output stream for writing data.
connect(String, String) - Method in class com.kuryshee.safehome.httprequestsender.GetRequestSender
Connects to the server and tries to get the answer.
COUNT - Static variable in class com.kuryshee.safehome.appcommunicationconsts.AppCommunicationConsts
Constant for providing expected number of items.
createNewUser() - Method in class com.kuryshee.safehome.rpiserver.NewUserPage
This method checks whether the Servlet got the token information from a logic part.
createUser() - Method in class com.kuryshee.safehome.rpiserver.UserPage
